detectors.description:
MoonBase.deposit(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#506-520) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- totalSupply() == 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#514)

MoonBase.getPricePerFullShare() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#495-499) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- supply == 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#497)

Reentrancy in MoonBase.withdraw(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#526-531):
	External calls:
	- based.transfer(msg.sender,_basedAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#529)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _burn(msg.sender,_shares) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#530)
		- _totalSupply = _totalSupply.sub(value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#378)

Reentrancy in [MoonBase.withdraw(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#L526-L531):

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [_burn(msg.sender,_shares)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#L530)
		- [_totalSupply = _totalSupply.sub(value)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#L378)

Reentrancy in MoonBase.deposit(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#506-520):
	External calls:
	- based.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#510)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _mint(msg.sender,shares) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#519)
		- _balances[account] = _balances[account].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#360)
	- _mint(msg.sender,shares) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#519)
		- _totalSupply = _totalSupply.add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBase.sol#359)
